title: Tame Impala Resurrects â€˜Sundown Syndromeâ€™ at Halloween BarclaysÂ Show

body: Tame Impala pulled a few tricksâ€”and fan-favorite treatsâ€”out of the vault on Halloween night in Brooklyn. Kevin Parker brought his Deadbeat Tour to Barclays Center on Thursday (Oct. 31), performing the live rarity â€œSundown Syndromeâ€ for the first time in seven years. The psych-pop gem, originally released as Tame Impalaâ€™s debut single in 2009, hadnâ€™t appeared on a tour setlist since 2018. The moment came midway through night three of a four-night sold-out run at the arena, with Parker and his touring band all dressed in costumes nodding to Parkerâ€™s â€œscarf-eraâ€ aesthetic from the early 2010s. The Halloween chaos didnâ€™t stop there. Comedian and longtime Tame Impala fan Eric Andre made an unexpected cameoâ€”inside the showâ€™s bathroom cam. Parker has famously included a backstage toilet feed on tour to give fans a surreal behind-the-scenes moment mid-set. This time, Andre took over the screen, sharing a quick on-camera kiss with Parker, eliciting laughter and cheers from the crowd. â€œSundown Syndromeâ€ joins a string of surprises from the Deadbeat tour, which kicked off earlier this week in Brooklyn with the debut of several new tracks and a cover of Justiceâ€™s â€œD.A.N.C.E.â€ The run supportsâ€¦

title: Drake Supports Hometown Blue Jays at Game 6 of the WorldÂ Series
summary: Also attending the game were Rush frontman Geddy Lee, Schittâ€™s Creek stars Eugene Levy and Annie Murphy and more.
body: Drake stepped out in full hometown hero mode on Halloween night (Oct. 31), attending Game 6 of the 2025 World Series at Rogers Centre in Toronto as the Blue Jays attempted to clinch their first championship since 1993. The rapper, who has been trolling Los Angeles Dodgers star Shohei Ohtani on social media throughout the series, was among a stacked lineup of celebrities cheering on the Jays in their showdown against L.A. â€œOctoberâ€™s Very Own is back at the #WorldSeries,â€ MLB captioned a post on X , sharing footage of Drake arriving in the stadium. His appearance was part of a Halloween-night spectacle that included a whoâ€™s who of Canadian royalty and celebrity fans. Also attending the game were Rush frontman Geddy Lee, Schittâ€™s Creek stars Eugene Levy and Annie Murphy, former tennis pro Eugenie Bouchard, and Sliders actor Jerry Oâ€™Connell. Baseball legends Paul Molitor and Jack Morris â€” both World Series MVPs with the Blue Jays and Twins respectively â€” were also spotted in the stands. Drakeâ€™s recent Instagram Story posts have only amplified his sports-fan persona. After Game 5, he shared a photo of Ohtani wearing a sweater vest, cheekily captioned â€œONE MORE!!!!!!!â€ before following â€¦

title: Mariah Carey Announces â€˜Itâ€™s Timeâ€™ for Christmas 2025 in Ad WithÂ Sephora
summary: Carey's holiday season welcome in partnership with Sephora co-stars Billy Eichner.
body: Mariah Carey ‘s welcome to the Christmas season is here. The “All I Want for Christmas Is You” hitmaker made an official announcement to kick off the holidays in partnership with Sephora. “Halloween slayed,” Carey says in the Joseph Kahn-directed ad that dropped as Halloween (Oct. 31) came to a close. “But now … it’s time!” There’s one problem: Someone’s rummaged through the pop diva’s Sephora bag and pilfered the new beauty goodies she snagged for the 2025 holidays. In the lighthearted spot, Carey demands someone spill the tea on who stole her makeup so she can ring in the season of her modern Christmas carol, and — spoiler alert — it’s not the Grinch. It’s Billy Eichner as an overworked elf advocating for better treatment at Christmastime. “Bad news, Mariah Carey,” the comedian taunts. “The elves are striking this year. Elf revenge for putting us through holiday hell! Santa’s helper quit. I’m pawning this so I can afford elf therapy!” “That’s my blush, elf boy,” Carey says. “Your lipstick? I’m taking it. No bells. No châ€¦

title: The Best 2025 Halloween Costumes From Lady Gaga, Megan Thee Stallion, Justin Bieber, Victoria Justice & MoreÂ (Updating)
summary: Here's a roundup of the best 2025 celebrity Halloween costumes.
body: With Halloween falling on a Friday this year, it looks like we’re getting two full weekends of Halloween celebration. Things kicked off last week, with Victoria Justice hosting her “Love Zombie” Halloween & Single Release Party in Los Angeles and embodying her new song by dressing up as the titular undead character. Bette Midler ‘s New York Restoration Project Hulaween Gala hit New York City over the weekend, and Midler hit the red carpet dressed as her own Divine Miss M persona next to Andy Cohen as Andy Warhol. Other celebs at Midler’s party: Ben Platt and husband Noah Galvin as Hugh Hefner and a Playboy Playmate, Darren Criss and wife Mia Criss as New York clowns, and Michael Kors and husband Lance LePere as taxi drivers. Related The 25 Biggest Halloween Songs of All Time on the Hot 100 But some stars didn’t need a party to get dolled up. Paris Hilton took to Instagram to show off her “Oops… I Did It Again!”-era Britney Spears costume , complete with red latex bodysuit. “Oops, I did it again … Starting off #Halloweek by honoring my Queen @BritneySpears,” Hilton captured the series of photos and vidâ€¦

Kali Uchis to Receive Special Honor Kali Uchis has been named a 2025 ASCAP Women Behind the Music, alongside honorees Kehlani and KPop Demon Huntersâ€™ lead vocalist EJAE. â€œEvery year, ASCAP looks forward to spotlighting some of musicâ€™s most extraordinary women by honoring them for their achievements at our Women Behind the Music event,â€ said Nicole George-Middleton, ASCAP Executive Vice President & Head of Creative Membership, in a statement. â€œThis year we are thrilled to recognize three women who are pushing boundaries and capturing the world’s attention across different genres. Their creative success has propelled them to the top of the charts and is set to inspire the next generation of women in music.â€ The Colombian artist will receive her award at the 17 th annual ASCAP Women Behind the Music event, taking place Wednesday, Nov. 12 in Los Angeles, just weeks after her Superstar Q&A at the 2025 Billboard Latin Music Week in Miami lastâ€¦

title: Oasis Ends 19-Year Drought With Blinding First Concert of Australian â€˜Live â€˜25â€™Â Tour
summary: â€œNice one for putting up with us for so many years,â€ Liam told the faithful in Melbourne, many of whom flew from interstate or New Zealand for the occasion. â€œWe f***ing love ya.â€
body: The reunion of Oasis , of the long-feuding Gallagher brothers, isnâ€™t so much the stuff of legend, a surprise no one saw coming, or a comeback of the ages. Chalk it down as a rock â€˜nâ€™ roll miracle. Fans had given up hope long ago. Oasis split proper in 2009, following another backstage row, and any flicker of hope was snuffed out two years later when acrimony turned legal. Even the Gallaghersâ€™ mom Peggy stepped in, pleading for her boys to bury the hatchet. All to no avail. That was half a world away, a lifetime ago. Miracles do happen. Australians were witness to one Friday night, Oct. 31, as Oasis swept into Melbourneâ€™s Marvel Stadium, the opener for the Australian lap of their Live â€™25 world tour, and their first show on these shores in 19 years. The Victorian capital is always buzzing at this time of the year. The Melbourne Cup Carnival is underway, so too is Halloween, and at month’s end, the towering Melbourne Cricket Ground hosted an international cricket match, the visiting Indian menâ€™s team taking on the national team. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Oasis (@oasis) On showday, Oasis t-shirts are the dress code for Melbourneâ€™s CBD. In every cafÃ©, on everyâ€¦

title: Taylor Momsen Rocks New Version of â€˜Grinchâ€™ Song â€˜Where Are You Christmas?â€™
summary: The reimagined version appears on the bandâ€™s new holiday EP, Taylor Momsenâ€™s Pretty Reckless Christmas, released Oct. 31.
body: Taylor Momsen is revisiting a holiday classic â€” with a rock twist. The Pretty Reckless frontwoman has re-recorded â€œWhere Are You Christmas?â€ 25 years after first performing the song as Cindy Lou Who in How the Grinch Stole Christmas . The reimagined version appears on the bandâ€™s new holiday EP, Taylor Momsenâ€™s Pretty Reckless Christmas , released Friday (Oct. 31) via Fearless Records. The original ballad, co-written by Mariah Carey, James Horner, and Will Jennings, first appeared on the 2000 filmâ€™s soundtrack and was famously performed by Momsen at just seven years old. That same year, Faith Hillâ€™s version reached No. 65 on the Billboard Hot 100. Momsenâ€™s 2025 update opens with a nostalgic snippet of her childhood recording before launching into a full-blown rock version, anchored by crunchy guitars and her signature gritty vocals. â€œWhere are you, Christmas? Why canâ€™t I find you?â€ she sings, giving the wistful lyrics new energy and edge. The six-track EP also includes four original songs â€” â€œI Wanna Be Your Christmas Tree,â€ â€œChristmas Is Killing Me,â€ â€œBlues on Christmas,â€ and â€œWhen We Were Youngâ€ â€” as well as a reprise titled â€œChristmas, Why Canâ€™t I Find You.â€ â€œ Pretty Reckless Chrâ€¦

title: Ozzy Osbourneâ€™s Grandson Recreates Bat-Biting Moment forÂ Halloween
summary: "Learned from the greatest, Papa!" Kelly Osbourne captioned the video.
body: Ozzy Osbourneâ€™s legacy echoed through Halloween this year thanks to a viral video of his grandson reenacting one of the most notorious moments in rock history. In a TikTok shared on Oct. 31 by Osbourneâ€™s daughter Kelly, her two-year-old son Sidney is seen wearing a skeleton outfit and red cowboy boots, gleefully biting the head off a stuffed bat. â€œLearned from the greatest, Papa!â€ Kelly captioned the clip, which plays over Osbourneâ€™s 1980 hit â€œCrazy Train.â€ @kellyosbourneyo Learned from the greatest, Papa! â™¬ som original – MusicTok The moment nods directly to Ozzyâ€™s infamous 1982 concert in Des Moines, Iowa, where he bit the head off what turned out to be a real bat onstage â€” a career-defining stunt thatâ€™s followed him for decades. The metal icon, who died in July at age 76 , spoke openly about the incident in later years. â€œIâ€™ve achieved quite a lot in my life, but all people do is go, â€˜Ozzy, what do bats really taste like?â€™â€ he told People in a 2022 interview. â€œBut Iâ€™ll tell you what, when they gave me the rabies shot, I wasnâ€™t smiling.â€ Osbourne maintained a close relationship with Sidney up until his death. Earlier this year, Kelly shared that her sonâ€™s favorite time of dâ€¦

title: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia'

summary: Meet the person behind women's football's first Â£1m player, Arsenal's new superstar forward Olivia Smith.

summary: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.

summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

summary: Film about a Swedish galleon which sank after setting off on her maiden voyage in 1628.
